TDAT:     private void coyoteService(final HttpRequest httpReq, final HttpResponse httpRes) {
        // TODO: reuse, per req
        RequestData rc = new RequestData();
        rc.init(httpReq, httpRes);
        
        try {
            adapter.service(rc.req, rc.res);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

COM:takes an HTTP request and response, initializes a RequestData object, and services the request using an adapter while catching any possible exceptions
